m_szDocTitle: 1st In-Action Video Of Tesla Model X Falcon-Wing Door | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: 1st In-Action Video Of Tesla Model X Falcon-Wing Door Originally published on EV Obsession . Some spy shooters recently landed a gold mine while at Tesla’s factory in Fremont, California — they caught the Tesla Model X on camera with one of its falcon-wing doors opening and closing!! Sort of surprising that no one caught one before now, but just a few days before the official unveiling, it’s the perfect way to cap several months of fun spy shots and videos. Here’s the video (published yesterday), which was  shared on the Tesla Motors Club forum by the brother of the driver (and brother-in-law
